name: PAVOdometerView
summary: A view that mimics an analog automobile odometer.
description: A subclass of UIView that mimics an analog automobile odometer. It has multiple columns of numbers that when animated, will "rotate" each column a correct number of times to scroll up to the new number. The animation is not 100% correct in that it does not "rachet" a columns preceding digit, it only smoothly animates all columns simultaneous at this time.
